title: Emma the Bumble Bee: A beautiful story designed to help children believe and trust themselves. Giving them confidence and leadership skills.
description: Emma is a young bee on her first day going out to collect pollen. Every young bee is intrusted with this important duty and Emma has to find within herself the strength and inner wisdom that is every bee's birthright. This book comes with a unique exercise designed to help parents support their child in developing self-trust and personal strength.
author: Monica Dumont
